name: Monke Game 2: Quest for Banan: GOTY Edition
name_original: Monke Game 2: Quest for Banan: GOTY Edition
description:
Monke arrives on moon. Conquer. Claim. Eat Banan.

Get your Monke Game Merch HERE!


Welcome to the widely anticipated sequel to the cult hit "Monke Game". Join Monke on his quest for the last banana, held in an alien marketplace for $5, and journey across the moon on an epic adventure.
